titleInfo.title: Letter, J. Crozier Ramsey in Nashville, Tenn., to J.G.M. Ramsey in Charlotte, N.C. 1865 Nov. 13

mods.abstract: 1865 Nov. 13 J. Crozier Ramsey, Nashville, Tenn., to his father, J.G.M. Ramsey, Charlotte, N.C. Sentimental expression of his affection and loneliness for his family. Description of the state of his health and his financial condition. Long discussion of the legal aspects of J.G.M.'s chances of recovering his property. Advises his father to risk a trial and to sell the property at a loss only if his need for money makes it essential.

subject.topic: Land tenure -- Political aspects -- Tennessee -- Knoxville -- History -- 19th century
